title: LLM-Based Strategies for Enhancing Engagement in Science English Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Targets managers/leaders requiring science-field practical English. Requires self-directed learning environment construction using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners will design three or more English learning scenarios in science fields using LLM tools.
Learners will complete a rubric for assessing learning engagement based on Self-Determination Theory (SDT) with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners will create two or more 5-minute microlearning contents using LLMs in a mobile environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
